datasets.name: ac2810e1
datasets.query: SELECT BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, workspaceid, concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") as name, dagf.dasf_control_id as DAGF FROM ( SELECT id, score, chk_date, workspaceid FROM arunuc.security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = coalesce ( ( select max(run_id) from arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc, arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw where concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id and completed = true and chk_date = :date_param ), ( select max(run_id) from arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc, arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw where concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id and completed = true ) ) ) SC, arunuc.security_analysis.security_best_practices BP, arunuc.security_analysis.sat_dagf_mapping dagf, arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw WHERE SC.id = BP.id and dagf.sat_id = BP.id and concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid and aw.workspace_id = SC.workspaceid and aw.analysis_enabled = true ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

datasets.name: 367ba156
datasets.query:
SELECT
  name,
  value.value
FROM
  arunuc.security_analysis.account_info ai,
  arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
where
  category = 'Account Stats'
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
        arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
      where
        concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = :date_param
        and aw.analysis_enabled = true
        and aw.workspace_id = wrc.workspace_id
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
        arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
      where
        concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
        and completed = true
    )
  )
  and concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
  and aw.workspace_id = ai.workspaceid
ORDER BY
  name

datasets.name: 5e73087c
datasets.query:
Select
  concat(
    results.category,
    ' (Out of ',
    category_count,
    ')'
  ) as category,
  severity,
  severity_count,
  ord
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      sbp.category,
      sbp.severity,
      count(sbp.severity) severity_count,
      CASE
        WHEN sbp.severity = 'High' THEN 3
        WHEN sbp.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2
        ELSE 1
      END as ord
    FROM
      arunuc.security_analysis.security_checks sc,
      arunuc.security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp,
      arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
    where
      score = 1
      and sc.id = sbp.id
      and run_id = coalesce (
        (
          select
            max(run_id)
          from
            arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
            arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
          where
            concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
            and aw.workspace_id = wrc.workspace_id
            and completed = true
            and chk_date = :date_param
            and aw.analysis_enabled = true
        ),
        (
          select
            max(run_id)
          from
            arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
            arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
          where
            concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
            and aw.workspace_id = wrc.workspace_id
            and completed = true
        )
      )
      and category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
      and concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
      and sc.workspaceid = aw.workspace_id
    group by
      sbp.category,
      sbp.severity
  ) as results,
  (
    SELECT
      category,
      count(*) as category_count
    FROM
      arunuc.security_analysis.security_best_practices
    WHERE
      category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
    group by
      category
  ) as master
where
  results.category = master.category

parameters.displayName: Analysis date (Shows results for the most recent analysis when no analysis is found for this date)

datasets.name: 2eb723f9
datasets.query:
SELECT
  count(*) as counter
FROM
  arunuc.security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  arunuc.security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp,
  arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
where
  sc.id = sbp.id
  and sbp.severity = :severity
  and sc.score = 1
  and sbp.category = :category
  and concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
  and sc.workspaceid = aw.workspace_id
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
        arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
      where
        concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = :date_param
        and aw.workspace_id = wrc.workspace_id
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
        arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
      where
        concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
        and completed = true
        and aw.workspace_id = wrc.workspace_id
    )
  )

datasets.name: 7088f4c8
datasets.query:
select
  sbp.check_id,
  sbp.check,
  sbp.recommendation,
  sc.additional_details,
  sbp.logic,
  if(
    sbp.evaluation_value == "-1",
    "N/A",
    sbp.evaluation_value
  ) as evaluation_value,
  regexp_replace(sbp.api, "<workspace_url>", aw.deployment_url) as api,
  sc.check_time
from
  arunuc.security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  arunuc.security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp,
  arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
where
  sc.id = sbp.id
  and sc.run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
        arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
      where
        concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
        and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = :date_param
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
        arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
      where
        concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
        and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id
        and completed = true
    )
  )
  and concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
  and aw.workspace_id = sc.workspaceid

datasets.name: de3b92f6
datasets.query: SELECT sc1.score as current_score, sc2.score as previous_score, BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, sc1.score as Run1Status, sc2.score as Run2Status, sc1.check_time as Run1Date, sc2.check_time as Run2Date, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, sc1.workspaceid FROM arunuc.security_analysis.security_checks sc1, arunuc.security_analysis.security_checks sc2, arunuc.security_analysis.security_best_practices BP, arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw where concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid and sc1.workspaceid = aw.workspace_id and sc2.workspaceid = sc1.workspaceid and sc1.id = sc2.id and sc1.id = BP.id and sc1.run_id = coalesce ( ( select max(run_id) from arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc, arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw where concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id and completed = true and chk_date = :current_run_date ), ( select max(run_id) from arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc, arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw where concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id and completed = true ) ) and sc2.run_id = ( select max(run_id) from arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc, arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw where concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id and completed = true and run_id = ( select max(run_id) from arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc, arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw where concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id and completed = true and chk_date = :previous_run_date ) )

datasets.name: f1a73f2e
datasets.query:
SELECT
  max(sc.check_time) date
FROM
  arunuc.security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
where
  concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
  and sc.workspaceid = aw.workspace_id
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
        arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
      where
        concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
        and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = :date_param
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id) 
      from
        arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
        arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
      where
        concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
        and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id
        and completed = true
    )
  )

datasets.name: 9264c052
datasets.query:
SELECT
  workspace_id as value,
  concat(workspace_name, " (", workspace_id, ")") as name
FROM
  arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces
WHERE
  analysis_enabled = true
order by workspace_id asc

datasets.name: a4f85627
datasets.query:
SELECT wrc.chk_date, wrc.workspace_id, concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") as name
FROM 
    arunuc.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc,
    arunuc.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
WHERE
concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") = :workspaceid
and wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id

# AI Governance

widget.name: 78559a07
widget.textbox_spec:
> Caution: 
Please make sure to review the SAT report with your business stakeholders, administrators, security team, and auditors about the SAT report and assess your organizational security requirements before making any security improvements based on the report, not all deviations are required to be mitigated. Some of the recommendations may have cost implications, and some of the security features recommended may have dependency feature limitations; please thoroughly review individual features documentation before making changes to your security configurations.

widget.name: c4fe8ad6
widget.textbox_spec: > Note:If you haven't already done so, please make sure you completed the self-assessment for SSO, SCIM, and Table Access Control checks. As per the [Usage instructions](https://github.com/databricks-industry-solutions/security-analysis-tool/blob/main/docs/setup.md#usage), Workspace -> Applications -> SAT -> files -> self_assessment_checks.yaml and make sure the "enabled" values reflect your environment for the listed manual checks with either true or false. SAT will automatically check the rest of the configurations.
